CustomField.description: The GM Email Override field from the linked account. If non-blank, then the letter will be sent to that address(es) when emailed rather to than those in the Emails field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The GM Email Override field from the linked account. If non-blank, then the letter will be sent to that address(es) when emailed rather to than those in the Emails field.
CustomField.label: Email override from account
